name: Red V S Blue
description:
This is my entry for Ludum Dare 41, Red VS Blue!  The theme was "Combine Two Incompatible Genres" and I hope you'll enjoy finding out what genres I chose!

The game begins as a clicker-style game.  Click the mine and barracks for each soldier type to create them.  As you gain precious Cyberdinium from your mine, use it to upgrade the speed at which your buildings produce.  This will also turn on the auto-click feature!

Choose which units to make and how to upgrade them in the three minutes you're given...then see how the battle turns out!
